TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi User extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the information about the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和方法公开的`My.User`对象提供对当前用户的相关信息的访问。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user. Windows 和 Web 应用程序之间，"当前用户"的含义略有不同。The meaning of "current user" differs slightly between Windows and Web applications. 在 Windows 应用程序中，当前用户是运行应用程序的用户。In a Windows application, the current user is the user who runs the application. 在 Web 应用程序中，当前用户是访问应用程序的用户。In a Web application, the current user is the user who accesses the application. `My.User`属性还提供对访问为当前用户。The `My.User` property also provides access to the for the current user. 主体对象表示用户的安全上下文，包括该用户的标识和该用户所属的任何角色。A principal object represents the user's security context, including that user's identity and any roles to which the user belongs. 对于 Windows 应用程序，此属性提供相同的功能属性。For Windows applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property. 对于 Web 应用程序，此属性提供相同的功能属性返回的对象属性。For Web applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property of the object returned by the property. > [!NOTE] > 对于 Windows 应用程序，只会生成项目**Windows 应用程序**模板初始化`My.User`默认情况下的对象。For Windows applications, only projects built on the **Windows Application** template initialize the `My.User` object by default. 在所有其他 Windows 项目类型，必须初始化`My.User`对象通过调用方法显式或通过将分配到的值。In all other Windows project types, you must initialize the `My.User` object by calling the method explicitly or by assigning a value to . > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象无法报告有关当前 Windows 用户在 Windows 95 和 Windows 98 下时运行，因为这些操作系统不支持登录的用户的概念的信息。The `My.User` object cannot report information about the current Windows user when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not support the concept of a logged-on user. 必须实现自定义身份验证使用`My.User`这些操作系统上的对象。You must implement custom authentication to use the `My.User` object on those operating systems. ## Examples 如果应用程序使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用该信息来分析此示例将检查`My.User.Name`属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前主体（对基于角色的安全性而言）。

span.span: Gets or sets the current principal (for role-based security).

value.span: 一个 值，表示安全上下文。

span.span: A value representing the security context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置`My.User.CurrentPrincipal`属性设置为一个对象，实现接口，以使自定义身份验证。You can set the `My.User.CurrentPrincipal` property to an object that implements the interface to enable custom authentication. 在大多数项目类型中，此属性获取和设置线程的当前主体。In most project types, this property gets and sets the thread's current principal. 在 ASP.NET 应用程序，此属性获取和设置当前 HTTP 请求的用户标识的安全信息。In an ASP.NET application, this property gets and sets the security information for the current HTTP request's user identity. 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 如果应用程序使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用该信息来分析此示例将检查`My.User.Name`属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

span.span: The caller does not have the permission required to set the principal.

Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void InitializeWithWindowsUser() cil managed

summary.span: 将线程的当前主体设置为启动应用程序的 Windows 用户。

span.span: Sets the thread's current principal to the Windows user that started the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用`My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser`方法将线程的当前主体设置为启动了应用程序的 Windows 用户。You can use the `My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser` method to set the thread's current principal to the Windows user that started the application. Visual Basic 应用程序模型在 Windows 应用程序中默认情况下，在启动时调用此方法。The Visual Basic Application Model in a Windows application calls this method at startup by default. 在其他项目类型，您必须设置线程的当前主体，通过显式调用此方法或通过将分配到的值。In other project types, you must set the thread's current principal by calling this method explicitly or by assigning a value to . 在 Windows 项目中，`My.User`对象所基于线程的当前主体; 因此，此方法可以更改的信息`My.User`返回。In Windows projects, the `My.User` object is based on the thread's current principal; therefore, this method can change the information `My.User` returns. 在 ASP.NET 应用程序，`My.User`对象取决于当前 HTTP 请求的用户标识，并不受此方法。In an ASP.NET application, the `My.User` object is based on the current HTTP request's user identity, and is unaffected by this method. > [!NOTE] > 具体行为`My.User`对象取决于应用程序的类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中对象，此属性包装属性。In the object, this property wraps the property. 重写此方法在派生类来提供不同的行为。Override this method in a derived class to provide different behavior. 例如，属性重写此属性。For example, the property overrides this property.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否验证了用户。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has been authenticated.

value.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsAuthenticated`属性允许您的代码以确定是否当前用户进行身份验证。The `My.User.IsAuthenticated` property allows your code to determine if the current user has been authenticated. > [!NOTE] > 具体行为`My.User`对象取决于应用程序类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例验证具有已对用户身份验证才能访问资源。This example verifies that the user has been authenticated before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 确定当前用户是否属于指定的角色。

span.span: Determines whether the current user belongs to the specified role.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool IsInRole(valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRole role) cil managed
Public Function IsInRole (role As BuiltInRole) As Boolean

param.name: role
param.span: 要检查其成员资格的内置 Windows 角色。

span.span: The built-in Windows role for which to check membership.

summary.span: 确定当前用户是否属于指定的角色。

span.span: Determines whether the current user belongs to the specified role.

returns.span: 如果当前用户是指定角色的成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current user is a member of the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsInRole`方法允许您的代码以确定当前用户是否指定角色的成员。The `My.User.IsInRole` method allows your code to determine if the current user is a member of the specified role. 重载`My.User.IsInRole`采用一个字符串的方法可轻松访问当前主体的方法。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a string provides easy access to the method of the current principal. 重载`My.User.IsInRole`方法采用`BuiltInRole`枚举的行为不同，具体取决于当前的主体。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a `BuiltInRole` enumeration behaves differently, depending on the current principal. 如果它是 Windows 用户主体 ()，此函数将转换`role`为等效枚举，并返回因调用。If it is a Windows user principal (), this function converts `role` to the equivalent enumeration and returns the result of calling . 如果当前主体是任何其他主体，此函数将传递中的枚举值的名称`role`的主体方法。If the current principal is any other principal, this function passes the name of the enumeration value in `role` to the principal's method. > [!NOTE] > 具体行为`My.User`对象取决于应用程序类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例检查用户是否是管理员才能访问资源。This example checks if the user is an administrator before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsInRole`方法允许您的代码以确定当前用户是否指定角色的成员。The `My.User.IsInRole` method allows your code to determine if the current user is a member of the specified role. 重载`My.User.IsInRole`采用一个字符串的方法可轻松访问当前主体的方法。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a string provides easy access to the method of the current principal. 重载`My.User.IsInRole`方法采用`BuiltInRole`枚举的行为不同，具体取决于当前的主体。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a `BuiltInRole` enumeration behaves differently, depending on the current principal. 如果它是 Windows 用户主体 ()，此函数将转换`role`为等效枚举，并返回因调用。If it is a Windows user principal (), this function converts `role` to the equivalent enumeration and returns the result of calling . 如果当前主体是任何其他主体，此函数将传递中的枚举值的名称`role`的主体方法。If the current principal is any other principal, this function passes the name of the enumeration value in `role` to the principal's method. > [!NOTE] > 具体行为`My.User`对象取决于应用程序类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例检查用户是否是管理员才能访问资源。This example checks if the user is an administrator before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the current user.
The name of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用`My.User`对象以获取有关当前用户的信息。You can use the `My.User` object to get information about the current user. 对用户进行身份验证的主体还可以控制用户名称的格式。The principal that authenticates the user also controls the format of the user name. 默认情况下，应用程序使用 Windows 身份验证，并且用户名称，格式为 DOMAIN\USERNAME。By default, an application uses Windows authentication, and the user name has the format DOMAIN\USERNAME. 主体的自定义实现不一定使用相同的格式。A custom implementation of the principal does not necessarily use the same format. > [!NOTE] > `My.User.Name`属性将返回空字符串时运行在 Windows 95 和 Windows 98，因为这些操作系统无法识别用户名。The `My.User.Name` property returns an empty string when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not recognize user names. > [!NOTE] > 具体行为`My.User`对象取决于应用程序类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 如果应用程序使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用该信息来分析此示例将检查`My.User.Name`属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
